summary: A couple of hard-drinking cardsharp drifters find themselves in the unlikely situation of having to play Cupid.
cast: Charles Boyer|Lee Marvin|Keenan Wynn|Rosemary Clooney|Adam Lazarre|Michael Davis|Mike Mazurki|Dub Taylor|Carmen Phillips|Elaine Walker|Jack Perkins|Charles Horvath|Paul Stader|Kelly Thordsen|Russ Brown|Robert Mitchum
title: The Losers
